alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 1:54PM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Very cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero are expected. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Feet and Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Feet. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An extended period of cold and snow is expected. Very low wind chills are expected tonight and again Wednesday night, with wind chills not rising above zero in some spots during this period. Light to moderate snow, with periods of heavy snow, will likely impact the morning and evening commutes today through Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
